tool_description: Records basic identifying information and contextual data about an artwork including dimensions, medium, attributed artist, and acquisition details.

artwork_title.description: Title or identifying name of the artwork

attributed_artist.description: Name of artist to whom the work is attributed

medium.description: Primary medium (oil on canvas, watercolor, bronze, etc.)

error_messages: Missing required artwork information: Provide artwork_title, attributed_artist, medium, dimensions_cm, and current_location.
Invalid dimensions format: Provide 2 or 3 numeric values for height, width, and optionally depth.
Empty string values: Title, artist, medium, and location cannot be empty strings.
usage: Enter all known identifying information about the artwork. This creates the foundation record that other assessment tools will reference.

artwork_id.description: Unique identifier generated for this artwork

completeness_score.description: Percentage of standard metadata fields completed
